Author: andyn
Content:
Interesting stuff there, I may have a poke around later.

Like the simple storage API too.

It seems against philosophy of this thing, but I'd like to see something similar that allowed for more separation of code and html/js/css etc. (I think I'm drifting into regular hosting territory though).

Author: sethg
Content: Alan Dershowitz once told the story of a court clerk who would approach the plaintiffs in every trial and say "For $5,000 I'll try to convince the judge to rule in your favor. If you still lose the case I'll give you your money back."  Then he would make the same offer to the defendants.
